name: A. Neil Arnason
content: Arnason, Neil Neil Arnason Position: Senior Scholar, Department of Computer Science, University of Manitoba Office: E2-584 (EITC) Phone: (204) 474-6918 (direct..no message); 474-8313 (office...messages) Fax: (204) 474-7609 Mail: E-Mail: arnason@cs.umanitoba.ca Snail-mail: c/o Department of Computer Science, University of Manitoba, Winnipeg, Manitoba, R3T 2N2 Canada Research: Scientific Statistical Analysis Scientific software development, simulation and data analysis, performance analysis of network systems, statistical ecology. Recent work in population biology: Recent publications in biometry Recent consulting and supervision in biology Population Analysis Software Group Recent work in computer science: Recent publications and supervision in computer science Publications (in pdf format): Complete publication list to January 2012 Teaching experience: introductory computer science; computer usage; computer networks; simulation and modelling; queuing theory and performance evaluation statistics for biologists; quantitative and theoretical ecology Educational Background Ph.D., Edinburgh University, 1971. (Biometry) M.Math. University of Waterloo, 1967. (Statistics and Computer Science) B.Sc., University of Waterloo, 1966 (Mathematics and Biology). CompSci Homepage \ Owner of this page: A. Neil Arnason -- arnason@cs.umanitoba.ca UofM CompSci WWW Administrator -- www@cs.umanitoba.ca UofM Campus WWW Administrator -- www@umanitoba.ca
